title: $:/plugins/inmysocks/QuickNotes
description: A basic note taking tool for TiddlyWiki
author: inmysocks
text:
{ "tiddlers": { "$:/plugins/inmysocks/QuickNotes/Note List": { "caption": "Note List", "created": "20141217001538052", "modified": "20141217014925474", "no_edit": "true", "tags": "", "title": "$:/plugins/inmysocks/QuickNotes/Note List", "text": "\define thisSearchMacro()
    <$list filter="[tag[Note]regexp:title[(?i)$(thisSearch)$]]">
  • <$link to=<>><>
\end \define thisEditMacro()
    <$list filter="[tag[Note]regexp:title[(?i)$(thisSearch)$]]"> <$set name=thisItem value=<>>
  • <$button message='tm-delete-tiddler' param=<>>{{$:/core/images/delete-button}}<$link to=<>><>
\end \define thisRegEx() $(thisSearch)$(?i) \end Search: <$edit-text tiddler='$:/temp/notelist' field='search'/>( <$reveal type='nomatch' state='$:/state/notelist/editreveal' text='edit'> <$button set='$:/state/notelist/editreveal' setTo='edit'>Edit List <$reveal type='match' state='$:/state/notelist/editreveal' text='edit'> <$button set='$:/state/notelist/editreveal' setTo='noedit'>Done Editing )
<$reveal type='nomatch' state='$:/state/notelist/editreveal' text='edit'> Type in the search box to search by name <$reveal type='match' state='$:/state/notelist/editreveal' text='edit'> Click on the trashcan icon to remove a note <$set name='thisSearch' value={{$:/temp/notelist!!search}}> <$reveal type='nomatch' state='$:/state/notelist/editreveal' text='edit'> <> <$reveal type='match' state='$:/state/notelist/editreveal' text='edit'> <> " }, "$:/plugins/inmysocks/QuickNotes/Quick Notes": { "caption": "Quick Notes", "created": "20141217001437415", "modified": "20141217014943477", "no_edit": "true", "tags": "Dashboard", "title": "$:/plugins/inmysocks/QuickNotes/Quick Notes", "text": "<>" }, "$:/plugins/inmysocks/QuickNotes/Write Quick Note": { "caption": "Write Quick Note", "created": "20141216223509853", "modified": "20141217014933961", "no_edit": "true", "title": "$:/plugins/inmysocks/QuickNotes/Write Quick Note", "text": "\define thisTempTiddler(stateNumber) $:/temp/$(someName)$$stateNumber$ \end <$set name=someName value=<>> <$tiddler tiddler=<>> Note Name: <$edit-text tiddler=<> field='name' class='tc-edit-texteditor' placeholder='Note Name'/> <$edit-text tiddler=<> field='text' class='tc-edit-texteditor' placeholder='Note Text'/> <$button>Create Note <$action-setfield $tiddler={{!!name}} $field='text' $value={{!!text}} tags='Note'/> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field='text' $value=''/> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field='name' $value=''/> <$button>Reset <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field='text' $value=''/> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field='name' $value=''/> " } } }
